title: Manjaro 23 Released With Linux 6.5, KDE Plasma 5.27 LTS, GNOME 44.4, Xfce 4.18
description:
Linux kernel 6.5 introduces features like Wi-Fi 7 support, MIDI 2.0 support, and improved support for AMD “Zen” systems to Manjaro 23.

The post Manjaro 23 Released With Linux 6.5, KDE Plasma 5.27 LTS, GNOME 44.4, Xfce 4.18 appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Fedora Linux KDE Spin Switching to Calamares Graphical Installer
description:
The Fedora Asahi Remix distribution for Apple Silicon devices, which is based on Fedora Linux KDE Spin, will use the Calamares graphical installer by default.

The post Fedora Linux KDE Spin Switching to Calamares Graphical Installer appeared first on Linux Today.

title: DXVK 2.3 Improves Performance in Tomb Raider Anniversary, Fixes Bugs
description:
DXVK 2.3 improves the presentation functionality by signaling frame latency events when an image is actually being presented. Learn more here.

The post DXVK 2.3 Improves Performance in Tomb Raider Anniversary, Fixes Bugs appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Linux Lite 6.6 Is Here But Still Relies on Xfce 4.16
description:
The lightweight Ubuntu-based Linux distribution Linux Lite has released version 6.6, focusing on language translations. Here’s what’s new!

The post Linux Lite 6.6 Is Here But Still Relies on Xfce 4.16 appeared first on Linux Today.

title: GNOME 45 Breaks Extensions’ Compatibility
description:
Due to the move to standard JavaScript modules (ESM), GNOME 45 will not be compatible with extensions for older GNOME versions. Learn more about it here!

The post GNOME 45 Breaks Extensions’ Compatibility appeared first on Linux Today.

title: fwupd 1.9.5 Brings Support for More Devices
description:
fwupd 1.9.5 enables firmware upgrading on several System76 devices, HP Rata/Remi BLE mice, Genesys GL3525S USB hub, and more.

The post fwupd 1.9.5 Brings Support for More Devices appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Armbian 23.08 Brings Support for Lenovo X13s
description:
Armbian 23.08 is here with support for the most recent memory chips on the Banana Pi BPI-M5 single-board computer. Learn more here.

The post Armbian 23.08 Brings Support for Lenovo X13s appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Nitrux 3.0 Brings Plasma 5.27.7 and Latest Software Updates
description:
Powered by Liquorix kernel 6.4, Nitrux 3.0 ships with the most up-to-date Plasma 5.27.7, bug fixes, and the latest Maui apps.

The post Nitrux 3.0 Brings Plasma 5.27.7 and Latest Software Updates appeared first on Linux Today.
